HTMX Response Headers.

  • Response Headers Reference

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    HX_LOCATION
    Allows you to do a client-side redirect that does not do a full page reload.
    static final String
    HX_PUSH_URL
    Pushes a new url into the history stack.
    static final String
    HX_REDIRECT
    Can be used to do a client-side redirect to a new location.
    static final String
    HX_REFRESH
    Can be used to do a full refresh of the page on the client-side.
    static final String
    HX_REPLACE_URL
    Allows you to replace the current URL in the location bar.
    static final String
    HX_RESELECT
    A CSS selector that allows you to choose which part of the response is used to be swapped in.
    static final String
    HX_RESWAP
    Allows you to specify how the response will be swapped.
    static final String
    HX_RETARGET
    A CSS selector that updates the target of the content update to a different element on the page.
    static final String
    HX_TRIGGER
    Can be used to trigger client side events.
    static final String
    HX_TRIGGER_AFTER_SETTLE
    Can be used to trigger client side events after the settling step.
    static final String
    HX_TRIGGER_AFTER_SWAP
    Can be used to trigger client side events after the swap step.
